meanings.definition: People who have been erased from existence.
meanings.sent1: The unpersons in the story were forgotten by everyone.
meanings.sent2: The government declared the rebels as unpersons.
meanings.sent3: The unpersons at the party turned out to be secret agents!
meanings.sent4: In the eerie movie, the unpersons vanished into thin air.
meanings.sent5: The concept of unpersons is both chilling and intriguing.
meanings.sent6: After the incident, the unpersons were never mentioned again.

meanings.definition: To remove someone from all records and memory.
meanings.sent1: The dictator tried to unpersons his political rivals.
meanings.sent2: She decided to unpersons all traces of her ex-boyfriend from her life.
